data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Park, Jong-Seok, Carlton, Christopher E., Ferro, Michael L. (2010): Diversity and taxonomic review of Leptusa Kraatz (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae) from Great Smoky Mountains National Park, U. S. A., with descriptions of four new species. Zootaxa 2662: 1-27, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.199052
